title: Introducing 'The View: Behind the Table'
description:
"The View" and ABC Audio present “Behind The Table,” a special podcast series featuring former and current co-hosts for an extraordinary look inside the talk show that has been making headlines since Barbara Walters first uttered the phrase, “I had this idea for a show.” Hear candid and revealing conversations, never-before-heard stories, first-hand details behind headline-making controversies and moments that firmly cemented "The View" in pop culture history from the incredible women who have had a seat at the table.
Listen to "The View" weekdays on your favorite podcast app! Just search for "The View" on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you like to listen. For more: https://abcaudio.com/podcasts/the-view
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
